timeline.bodyText: Maybe in this case you could keep the errorMsg variable to avoid duplication. Also the code gets more readable with spaces around +.
timeline.author: zbynek

timeline.bodyText: It's unclear what "default values" refers to.
timeline.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the feedback! I'll change the name to something more specific.
replies.author: helenSpry

timeline.message: added back variable to reduce duplication and changed name of method
